BAMTECH Media (ex-Cake Solutions) - UK - Scala Engineers (all levels) - DevOps (all levels) - SRE Lead

BAMTECH Media are experts in delivering DTC streaming platforms for brands like MLB.TV, NHL.TV and Playstation Vue, and since gaining the backing of Disney in Aug 2017, we've also launched new platforms for EuroSport and ESPN+. We are a distributed development team that promotes the use of Agile methods whilst maintaining a mature DevOps culture. We're also big community players sponsoring events like Scala Days, releasing our Weekly Scala series of blogs, and hosting Scala and Reactive meetups.

If you're interested to hear more, either look through the roles on our careers page https://www.cakesolutions.net/careers or alternatively contact me sam.facer@bamtechmedia.com
